snippet: The men’s trials will be held in St. Louis from June 23 to 26, 2016, and the women’s trials will be from July 8 to 10 in San Jose, Calif.
abstract: Gymnastic trials for 2016 Olympics will be held separately for first time in 40 years, with men's taking place in St Louis and women's in San Jose, Calif.
lead_paragraph: The men’s trials will be held in St. Louis from June 23 to 26, 2016, and the women’s trials will be from July 8 to 10 in San Jose, Calif.

headline.main: Olympic Trials to Be Held Separately
headline.print_headline: Olympic Trials to Be Held Separately
